i sell miscelaneous stuff in local fairs.

Others may be disappointed that I didn't pass the audition, but I'll keep trying my best.

content.text: Doing well, just got back from a Renaissance Faire.
Oh fun! I love the Renaissance Faire. I have a secret passion for fashion design, but I keep it hidden from my conservative family.
That's so cool! I'm a big fan of music as a way to express myself.
Music is really important to me too. I'm a busy mom who's always on the go, but I always make time for my morning coffee.
Coffee is the best! I live on a lake with my family. I love being in the suburbs because I have more space for my family and our movie collection.
That sounds lovely. I'm originally from the suburbs, but I now live in the city. I love the energy of the city, but I do miss the space of the suburbs.
It's always nice to get back to the suburbs and relax.
Absolutely. What do you like to do for fun?
I love to go to the movies with my family, and I also enjoy playing video games.
Me too! I love playing video games with my kids.
That's so nice. I'm glad you have a good relationship with your kids.
Thanks. I'm really lucky to have them in my life.
I know how you feel. I love my family more than anything in the world.
